title: I have heard great things about an annual chili cook-off that goes on at Hugh McCrae park, but I\'ve never been able to find information out about it.  I heard it may be on October 24 this year, but I haven\'t know about times or cost or anything.  When is the chili cook-off and how do I get in on the action?
text: Hello. Here's the answer to your question:: 2009 Chili Cook-Off: Come enjoy an afternoon of chili. Tickets are $5 to sample and judge all chili. No pets, no glass, coolers are welcome. All proceeds benefit the Domestic Violence Shelter and Services. At Hugh MacRae Park, College & Oleander Drive, Wilmington
